LandingPage.hero_description: Algorithmic intelligence for your peace of mind. Facilitate regulatory compliance (FDA) and take total control over your operations.
LandingPage.features_card1_desc: AI analyzes your temperature logs and proposes suggestions for anomalies, to be validated by your team.
LandingPage.features_card2_desc: Intelligent reading of your floor staff notes.
LandingPage.features_card3_desc: The interface instantly adapts to the native language of your kitchen brigade.
LandingPage.philosophy_intro: Most management software offers static dashboards and dead data.
LandingPage.philosophy_vision: We offer a living workflow that helps you anticipate problems before they arise.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar1_desc: Tracking health regulations and hygiene logs integrates naturally into your team's daily flow. Simple and frictionless.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar2_desc: The algorithm helps you spot anomalies (temperatures, expiry dates, service notes) before they become hurdles. Leave the restaurant with a light mind.
LandingPage.philosophy_pillar3_desc: The system doesn't just archive your data: it proposes suggested corrective actions to guide you in case of a problem.
LandingPage.protocol_phase1_desc: Import of your existing menu and configuration of your alerts.
LandingPage.protocol_phase2_desc: Artificial Intelligence classifies each dish and suggests corrective actions.
LandingPage.protocol_phase3_desc: Generation of social media posts and logbook summaries in multiple languages.
LandingPage.features_card1_ai_suggestion: Check the compressor and move the meats immediately.
LandingPage.features_card3_source_text: Clean the cold zone of the fridges
LandingPage.features_card3_target_text: Limpiar la zona frÃ­a de las neveras
LandingPage.features_title: All the instruments you need to navigate, in one place.
LandingPage.f1_desc: Forget loose notebooks. Staff handovers, equipment issues, and crew incidents are logged, mapped, and tracked by AI.
LandingPage.f1_ex1: Log an equipment storm (e.g., "Fridge 2 is leaking, mechanic called").
LandingPage.f1_ex2: Pass precise navigational instructions to the evening crew.
LandingPage.f1_ex3: Track passenger (guest) incidents to adjust course.
LandingPage.f2_desc: Rive helps you spot temperature and process anomalies, plotting corrective courses to avoid the compliance rocks.
LandingPage.f2_ex1: Fridge hits 8Â°C: suggestion for corrective action "Isolate or discard high-risk food".
LandingPage.f2_ex2: Automatic reminder for fryer oil checks.
LandingPage.f2_ex3: Documented HACCP procedures in case of inspection.
LandingPage.f3_desc: The language barrier no longer exists. Every member accesses the app and notes in their native language.
LandingPage.f3_ex1: The chef writes in Spanish, the dishwasher reads in Bengali.
LandingPage.f3_ex2: Recipe cards immediately understood by all new hires.
LandingPage.f3_ex3: Safety procedures acquired regardless of the employee's origin.
LandingPage.integrations_banner: Integrates natively with your POS systems: Toast, Square, SumUp, Stripe, Lightspeed, Zettle...
LandingPage.f4_desc: Your Profit Radar connects to your POS to cross-reference sales volumes with costs in real-time. Maximize your margins autonomously.
LandingPage.f4_ex1: Automatically import your sales from Toast, Square, SumUp, Zettle, or Lightspeed.
LandingPage.f4_ex2: Identify "Stars" vs "Rocks" dishes with the smart Performance Matrix.
LandingPage.f4_ex3: Incompatible system? Rive's AI natively parses and imports any CSV export.
LandingPage.f5_desc: Stop entering invoices manually. AI extracts line items, products, and quantities granularly to update your net costs.
LandingPage.f5_ex1: Photograph a supplier's crumpled invoice upon delivery.
LandingPage.f5_ex2: Granular line-by-line extraction and price variation alerts for ingredients.
LandingPage.f5_ex3: Live and automatic update of your recipes' Food Cost.
LandingPage.f6_desc: Attract new clients with engaging posts of your culinary highlights generated in one click.
LandingPage.f6_ex1: Generate a captivating caption for a Valentine's Day menu with perfect emojis.
LandingPage.f6_ex2: Automatically translate your posts to attract international clients.
LandingPage.f6_ex3: Draft a tempting description for your delivery platforms (UberEats, Deliveroo).
LandingPage.f7_desc: Sync all your client reservations from Libro, Resy, and Zenchef. Webhooks and automatic polling for real-time updates.
LandingPage.f7_ex1: Receive online reservations instantly without manual entry.
LandingPage.f7_ex2: Consolidate arriving guests, cancellations, and no-shows in a single central view.
LandingPage.f7_ex3: Cross-reference client data to anticipate your service volume.
LandingPage.f8_desc: Sonar Analysis cross-references your arriving passengers, sales currents, and maps to automatically generate the prep course.
LandingPage.f8_ex1: Calculate rations for each dish based on exact confirmed passengers.
LandingPage.f8_ex2: Aggregate raw ingredients needed to survive the upcoming expedition.
LandingPage.f8_ex3: Estimate total cargo cost before even raising the sails.
LandingPage.f1_mock_ai_task: âœ¨ AI: Task "Call the plumber" created
LandingPage.f6_mock_caption: Discover tonight's special menu! A perfectly seared bluefin tuna... âœ¨ Reservation in bio ğŸ‘‡
LandingPage.tier_essential_desc: The sturdy hull and ecosystem to structure your daily operations.
LandingPage.tier_performance_desc: Your Profit Radar to chart the most lucrative courses and margins.
LandingPage.tier_intelligence_desc: Deep Profit Topography with predictions to steer the fleet autonomously.
